thi-ap19:7.1: saṃsarantiyā → saṃsarantāya (bj) | saṃsarantā me (s2, s3, pts1)
thi-ap19:12.2: jātiyāpi ca ekato → jātīsu bahuso mama (bj) | jātiyā cāpi ekato (s2, s3, pts1)
thi-ap19:23.2: saṅgamaṃ te nidassitaṃ → sammukhā ca parammukhā (bj) | saṅgāmantena dassitaṃ (s2, s3) | saṅkamante nidassitaṃ (pts1)
thi-ap19:32.1: Parisāhi ca catūhi → parisāhi catūhi so (bj) | parisāhi catassohi (pts1)
thi-ap19:40.2: evaṃ patthesahaṃ tadā → tuṭṭhā evaṃ avocahaṃ (s2, s3) | tuṭṭhā eva patthesahaṃ (pts1) | evamahosahaṃ tadā (mr)
thi-ap19:41.2: patthe uttamamānasā → pattauttamamānasā (bj, s2, s3) | pattamuttamamānasā (pts1)
thi-ap19:64.2: sutavīrehi sokinī → sutavarehi sokinī (bj, s2, s3)
thi-ap19:65.2: bhattunopi ca → attanopica (s2, s3) | sutānakasakaṃ tadā (pts1)
thi-ap19:71.3: Rūpasobhaggasampannā → rūpasiriṃ anuppattā (s2, s3, pts1, c1)
thi-ap19:75.3: Na cāpi te dutiyo atthi koci → na catthi te dutiyā vaṇṇadhātu (bj, pts1, mr) | na cāpi tuyhaṃ dutiyatthi koci (s2, s3)
thi-ap19:76.4: tuvaṃ māra karissaseko → na māra bhāyāmi tavekikāpi (bj, mr) | māraṃ na bhāyāmi taṃ ekikāsiṃ (pts1)
